title: Snippity Snip ( Money Bagg Yo and Edgar Berlango)
itunes:title: Snippity Snip ( Money Bagg Yo and Edgar Berlango)
description:
Today on the show we had Money Bagg Yo stop by where he spoke about balance, trust issues, new album ‘A Gangsta’s Pain’ and more. Afterwards we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners first look at when it comes to first meeting someone, after Money bagg Yo mentioned that he keeps himself pampered. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Florida couple who tried to have a wedding at vacant mansion, but the owner came home.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
